definitions.definition: One who has behaved badly, or illegally .
examples: The teacher sent the miscreants to see the school principal.

definitions.definition: One not restrained by moral principles; an unscrupulous villain .
One who holds a false religious belief; a misbeliever .

main_definition: One who has behaved badly, or illegally .
secondary_definitions: One not restrained by moral principles; an unscrupulous villain .
( theology ) One who holds a false religious belief; a misbeliever .
